message: It's just another day at Hum-Drum Junk. I'm sitting behind the counter, watching Junker clean the shop.
Even after all the stuff I've been through, my life goes on like it always has, almost like none of it happened.
I know I should be happy.
But there's one thing missing from my life.
Noiz.
I never found out where Noiz went after our battle.
He never responded to my messages or calls, and before I knew it, days and months had passed.
At first, I searched for him like a mad man, but eventually I started to feel like that might not be the best approach.
When I fought him in Rhyme... I won. Without using Scrap.
Having learned what real pain was, he couldn't fight in Rhyme like he'd used to.
He was still plenty strong, but I'm positive that's why he couldn't beat me.
I have a feeling Noiz might have known it would turn out that way, but he challenged me to that fight all the same.
Not because he wanted revenge, but because he wanted us to fight as equals, as people who both knew pain.
And that's why I fought to win. That's why I had to win.
He needed to lose one more time. Now that he could feel pain, he could feel what losing meant.
After the match, Noiz congratulated me with his usual smile.
And that was the last I heard from him.
Did I destroy his pride by beating him?
Would it have been better if I'd lost?
I spent a long time second-guessing myself.
But after a while, I realized that I was wrong.
Noiz... isn't like that.
I don't know where he's gone, but I'm sure he has some kind of plan.
I know he's still fighting somewhere. That's what I've come to believe.

name: 蓮
message: "Aoba."
Ren looks up from his spot by my feet.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Hmmm?"

name: 蓮
message: "Your emotions are unstable. There has been no significant change in your circumstances recently. Are you alright?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "I'm fine, I swear. It'll all work out."
That's right. With time...

name: 羽賀
message: "Aoba."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Oh, yes?"
I straighten up and turn around.
Mr. Haga emerges from the back and sets a big white box on the counter.

name: 羽賀
message: "Could you check this package?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Yes."
I get up to start on the package, but notice Mr. Haga smiling at me.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Is something wrong?"

name: 羽賀
message: "Oh, no. Sorry. Don't mind me. I was just thinking how wonderful it is to be working with you again."

name: 羽賀
message: "It just hit me how lucky I am to have a simple life."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Well... can't disagree there."

name: 羽賀
message: "Indeed..."
A solemn silence falls...
